scripts.clean: rimraf docs/* && echo Purging old files...
scripts.prebuild: echo Creating Directories... && mkdirp docs/js docs/css && ROBOCOPY src docs index.html && ROBOCOPY src/img docs/img
scripts.compile-sass: echo Building and Minifying CSS... && node-sass --output-style compressed src/css/styles.scss | tee docs/css/style.min.css > src/css/styles.min.css
scripts.compile-modern-js: echo Building ES6+ Files... && cross-env BABEL_ENV=modern babel src/js/hymns.js | tee docs/js/hymns.min.js > src/js/hymns.min.js
scripts.compile-legacy-js: echo Building ES5 Files... && cross-env BABEL_ENV=legacy babel src/js/hymns.js | tee docs/js/hymns.legacy.min.js > src/js/hymns.legacy.min.js
scripts.build: echo Building Source Files... && npm run compile-sass && npm run compile-modern-js && npm run compile-legacy-js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
